sleep since early pregnancy that was almost years ago sleep train tip* before baby wakes up about half hour before pick you child up gently without waking baby up with bottle ready to feed pop it in mouth they will naturally feed while sleeping after gently put on shoulder burp then gently back down into bed it worked for both my kids started at weeks old wen had enough of waking up at night and after week they slept all through the night plus during day time naps when your motherly instincts tell you baby be up soon wake them up just used to kiss them all around their faces and they would wake up happy something about being woken up makes them more tired to sleep later at night after year is when decided to night wean felt the exact same way knew she could physically go the night
